product_description: A raw-edge hem and classic black denim add authenticity to this mini cut from a soft, sustainable cotton and Tencel® lyocell blend.
product_details_and_care:
A raw-edge hem and classic black denim add authenticity to this mini cut from a soft, sustainable cotton and Tencel® lyocell blend.
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
62% cotton, 36% Tencel lyocell, 2% Lycra® spandex
Tencel lyocell is a sustainably produced fiber made with closed-loop processing
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Kids' Wear
